c-0: ^DAD:  I AM your Father… But that sounds quite formal little miss, call me dad
^ ME:  OK Dad, but only if you stop calling me little miss… It’s demeaning
^DAD:  Haha I’m so stupid… I’m sorry, that’s my bad.. I’m just a little bit stressed about being trapped down here…

c-1: ^ ME:  Hey Dad!! How are you holding up?
^DAD:  Well.. If I’m being totally my dear I get a little bit claustrophobic.. and seasick…. And it’s quite chilly down here right? That’s not just me?? (Shivering)

msMotivator: ^ME:  That’s OK, Dad.. We’re all going to get through this, together
^DAD:  You’ve got a plan? You’re going to SAVE ME?! – I mean.. US?!

c-0: ^ME:  Yes! I will lead us to VICTORY! But I need your help
c-1: ^ME:  I do. Like I said, we’re going to get through this together.. as a family. Which means we all need to work together- will you help, Dad?

heCanTryHeGuesses: ^DAD:  Um… OK.. I can try, I guess

c-0: ^ME:  Amazing!  Thank you! Now, I need you to tell me something you’re good at?
c-1: ^ME:  Right so is there anything you can actually do? Have a real think…
^DAD:  Oh god no! There’s nothing… Thanks for speaking to me like that, you’re a really good leader, I feel worthless now

c-0: ^ ME:  Ohhh you’re upset. Self-pity will get you nowhere
^DAD:  (Scratching his head) Hahaha I’m so stupid… I’m absolutely useless
^ ME:  Come on DAD! You’re supposed to be the man of the house!! There must be at least SOMETHING you can do! Surely even you aren’t that utterly useless!
^DAD:  (Agitated!) Fine! I guess if I’m the man of the house I guess I must be big and strong! That’s me – big, strong, stupid DAD! Maybe I can use my HULK-ish MANLY strength?
^ ME: Right then.. Thank you.. Sorry for snapping.. Maybe we can work your strength into the plan somehow...

c-1: ^ ME:  Oh Dad I’m really sorry, I don’t mean to snap! I’m a little bit stressed about leading everyone to safety, but I shouldn’t take that out on you. I’m sorry

OK: ^DAD:  It’s OK, it’s OK. Thanks though.. I can definitely help… I suppose I make quite a stable footrest for your mother when she watches TV… I’m very sturdy!

c-0: ^ ME:  Mmmm ‘kay maybe we can work that into the plan…. Somehow?

help: ^DAD:  I’ll help in whatever way I can…
^I should make use of his brute strength

c-0: ^ME:  And just so I know… Have you got any weaknesses or anything else you want me to bear in mind?
^DAD:  Well, I have sensitive skin… I’m quite prone to splinters..
c-1: ^ME:  OK well then, I guess if you’re strong I could fine you something heavy to move…. I’m sure that would help is getting out of here!

bigDumbBrute: ^DAD:  (Sad noises) If you can tell me what to do… I don’t know what I’m good for in here, that’s for you to decide peanut.. I’m just a big dumb brute

c-0: ^DAD:  I can’t carry the key for you…but I can carry you!
^ ME:  You did it Dad, you saved us
^DAD:  (Proud Dad moment) No kid… WE saved us. We ESCAPEZED as a FAMILY!
c-1: ^ ME:  Just like I said dad… We got out of this together
^DAD:  (Proud Dad moment) WE sure did kid. We ESCAPEZED as a FAMILY!
c-2: ^ ME:  (Nasty nasty) You’re lucky to have a daughter like me to get us out of your mess!

^DAD:  (Sad Dad moment) Well I don’t know if you’re right to take all the credit! I think we got out of this together but suit yourself… I guess there’ll be no Capri-Sun in the ride home for you. You’ll be able to get some all by yourself I’m sure.

c-1: ^DAD:  Oh I don’t know. I guess I could try…

c-0: ^ ME:  It’s OK Dad, we can try again… we just need to find something to suit your specific strengths…
c-1: ^ ME:  (Scornfully) You really are useless aren’t you… What a PATHETIC excuse for a father and for a man! Why can’t you do this on simple task I ask of you!?
^DAD:  Gee, I wish I do it… but…. I keep getting splinters see.. I am a FAILUURREEEE!! (Father is distraught)
